summary: I feel bad for Maxence, he turned off comments on his latest Instagram post of him and his girlfriend (I think?) Fans can be so...

Pretty sure he got overwhelmed by the fangirls who couldn’t accept that he can have A LIFE(that includes having a girlfriend) I mean the one thing a fandom needs to do is respect the people they stan. How hard is it?

summary: The more I think about it, the more I think that skam France could have decided to combine the first separation (The: I don’t...
body:
The more I think about it, the more I think that skam France could have decided to combine the first separation (The: I don’t need crazy people in my life one) with the second separation the one after episode 8, into one big separation. 

Like what if they Eliott and Lucas have a non-reunion were maybe Lucas confronts him in person about leaving him and that the drawings weren’t going to be enough. So then Eliott has a manic episode in school. And after we can get an actual conversation were both boys apologize and explain themselves.

summary: I’m not sure I’m understanding why David’s reply means more  drama. I thought he was joking like saying, “what?! Last week...

tags: some of ya’ll are scary as shite
summary: Fan-squirrels be killing me...
body:
Fan-squirrels be killing me…

This fandom is killing me.

Please know I mean this from my heart when I say..

Get your crazy under control. Stop stalking these actors.

When somebody has to turn off comments on their post because nosey fuckers are drilling them about who the other person in the picture is…it is not long until they lock down their social media or ditch it all together.

Because some of ya’ll are scary as fuck. Stop it.

Tuck in your crazy. Write some fanfic. Build an altar in your closet..whatever you need to do. Just keep that shit under wraps.

Respect their privacy.

Thank you.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: criesinskam
blog.description: Del(phine) | 24 | French | she/her | lesbian | multifandom but mostly skam + remakes | not spoiler free

summary: Listen, I love Lucas so much, he has 100% become my son now. I need to see him happy, I really need the “Intervention” clip to...
body:
Listen, I love Lucas so much, he has 100% become my son now. I need to see him happy, I really need the “Intervention” clip to become the first step in Lucas feeling surrounded by love and support.

But I’m worried about Eliott too, and I’m gonna riot if I don’t see him be happy soon too. He’s probably feeling so lonely as well as the moment… Can David please at least let him have one (1) friend at school? Come on!

reblog.comment:

Listen, I love Lucas so much, he has 100% become my son now. I need to see him happy, I really need the “Intervention” clip to become the first step in Lucas feeling surrounded by love and support.

But I’m worried about Eliott too, and I’m gonna riot if I don’t see him be happy soon too. He’s probably feeling so lonely as well as the moment… Can David please at least let him have one (1) friend at school? Come on!
